transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello, bolo.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello, good morning sir, aawaz aa rahi hai meri?
Customer: Haan, aa rahi hai sir.
Executive: Sir, Shubham bol raha tha IndiaMART se head office se.
Customer: Eh ruko aap na thodi der ruko sir, abhi mera kaam chal raha hai.
Executive: In fact, sir aapne actually call kiya tha na customer care pe sir isliye main call kar raha tha aapko.
Customer: Nahi nahi, complaint karna tha, complaint karne ke liye call kiya tha, karna hai complaint lekin wo ruko mera abhi kaam hi chalu hai.
Executive: Kitne baje phone kar lu aapko sir?
Customer: Koi issue nahi, kitne baje phone kar lu?
Executive: Khud batao.
Customer: Kitne baje phone kar lu sir main aapko?
Customer: Main khud call karta, main court mein hu abhi, uske baad main aata aapko call karta, wo bahar.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai, okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to register a complaint.



Resolution:

- Executive asked when to call back.

- Customer said he would call back later.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

complaint

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- complaint, call back
